mapper.select: SELECT A.expValue , A.familyCustNickname , L.LEVEL as level FROM (SELECT SUM(CE.EXP_VALUE) as expValue , FC.FAMILY_CUST_NICKNAME as familyCustNickname FROM CUSTOM_EXP CE INNER JOIN FAMILY_CUSTOM FC ON CE.FAMILY_CUST_NO= FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND FC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE CE.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY CE.FAMILY_CUST_NO) A LEFT OUTER JOIN LEVEL L ON L.START_EXP <= A.expValue AND L.END_EXP >= A.expValue WHERE A.expValue between L.START_EXP AND L.END_EXP ORDER BY A.expValue DESC LIMIT 0, 100

SELECT A.expValue , A.familyCustNickname , A.gameCnt , L.LEVEL as level FROM (SELECT SUM(CE.EXP_VALUE) as expValue , SUM(IF(CE.EXP_STATE=#{_parameter},1,0)) as gameCnt , FC.FAMILY_CUST_NICKNAME as familyCustNickname FROM CUSTOM_EXP CE INNER JOIN FAMILY_CUSTOM FC ON CE.FAMILY_CUST_NO= FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND FC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE CE.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND CE.EXP_STATE IN ('LGS', 'LGW')
AND CE.EXP_STATE IN ('DGS', 'DGW')
AND CE.EXP_STATE IN ('GGS', 'GGW')
AND CE.EXP_STATE IN ('RGS', 'RGW')
GROUP BY CE.FAMILY_CUST_NO) A LEFT OUTER JOIN LEVEL L ON L.START_EXP <= A.expValue AND L.END_EXP >= A.expValue WHERE A.expValue between L.START_EXP AND L.END_EXP ORDER BY A.expValue DESC LIMIT 0, 100;
